attributes.action: I would like doctors and urologists to do more research into MSK in the UK.
attributes.background: Help people like myself who have been newly diagnosed with this disease and to help others who are also in this sitchuation. Doctors need more training and to do more research. So we can feel like we are being treated correctly and not told that our pains are a lie.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition calling on the Government or Parliament to fund research into musculoskeletal disorders.
